settings.content: Try the Emma CliMax Hybrid for maximum cooling & support →

settings.note: *For queen sizes only. All prices and information from public sources listed as of October 10, 2022. Information may not reflect updated prices and promotions.

settings.title: I can't wait for bedtime now!
settings.content: Sharing a conventional mattress that is sagging, with a long legged whippet was a disaster - most mornings I fell out of bed with him pushing me out. I now wake up every morning with much less pain and even the dog seems to love it!

settings.title: High quality mattress!
settings.content: I have used Emma Mattress for more than a month now and I'm totally in love with it. The quality of the mattress and comfort is definitely noteworthy. I would highly recommend using Emma if you are looking for premium quality mattress

settings.title: Best quality sleep I've ever had!
settings.content: I didn't realize how bad my previous mattress was until I received my Emma mattress. Not only do I sleep straight through the night (mind you, I sleep with my partner and dog and don't feel their movements at all!), I wake up energized and well rested. I no longer have any body aches and never feel too hot/too cold. Highly recommend!

settings.tab_content_1:
Our best-selling mattress redesigned for great pressure-relief and even greater support. Say goodbye to backpains!

  • Our most globally-awarded product
  • Combines hotel-quality comfort, pressure-relief, motion-isolation, cooling, and zoned support
  • Re-engineered to match American sleep preferences

    • Delivery time: Ships out the next business day
settings.tab_content_2:
• Budget-conscious sleepers who won’t compromise on quality

  • Great for couples and pet-lovers

settings.title: World’s Most Awarded Mattress
settings.desc: With over 70 product awards and a community of 4,000,000 Happy Sleepers globally, you can rest easy knowing that you’re getting the best for your bedroom with the Emma Original.

settings.title: At Prices You Won’t Lose Sleep Over
settings.desc: The Emma Original combines hotel-quality comfort, pressure relief, motion-isolation, cooling, and zoned support at a price you won’t lose sleep over.

settings.title: Luxurious Comfort in All Positions
settings.desc: Our pressure relieving 3-zone design allows the mattress to adjust to your shoulder, back, and hips zones, creating full body support that’s loved by back, side, and stomach sleepers.

settings.title: Don’t Sweat It
settings.description: Our team of sleep experts have designed the Emma mattress to allow for good airflow and top notch moisture regulation so you stay cool and sweat-free while you sleep.

settings.title: Emma's got your back
settings.description: Our pressure relieving 5-Zone mattress design provides full body support that adapts to any body type. This allows your spine to stay aligned whether you are a side sleeper, back sleeper or stomach sleeper.

settings.title: Sweet Dreams are Made of These
settings.description: The sleek and modern designs of our sleep products make them a great fit for any home. You can rest easy knowing you're only getting the best and comfiest accessories for your bedroom.

settings.title: For the Light Sleeper
settings.description: Our motion-isolating foam is designed to make sure that any movement from your pets, kids, or significant other from the other side of the bed won't disturb your good night's sleep.

settings.subtitle: ULTRADRY® ORIGINAL COVER
settings.title: Plush & Moisture-Wicking
settings.content: This temperature-regulating breathable cover makes mattress maintenance easy: It’s moisture-wicking, easy to remove, and washable.

settings.subtitle: POINT ELASTIC AIRGOCELL®
settings.title: Cool & Breathable
settings.content: This ground-breaking layer of hypersoft foam enhances breathability by absorbing and dissipating body heat so you keep your cool all night long.

settings.subtitle: HALO TRANSITION LAYER
settings.title: Ergonomic & Motion-Isolating
settings.content: The 3-zones in our mattresses are designed to provide both spinal alignment and pressure-relieving support for individual body zones, which include the shoulders, back, and hips. This layer also has over 100 supportive points that help distribute weight evenly & limiting motion transfer so that light sleepers can sleep easy when their partner (or pet!) tosses and turns in bed.

settings.subtitle: HRX SUPREME® FOAM
settings.title: Dependable & Durable
settings.content: HRX stands for High Resiliency Extra - This premium base foam layer was stress-tested  and is guaranteed to provide sturdy support and withstand even a decade of use.

settings.subtitle: EMMA EDGE SUPPORT
settings.title: Easy & Intuitive
settings.content: A reinforced perimeter that not only helps prevent restless and active sleepers from falling off at night, but also helps all sleepers easily sit up in the morning.

settings.subtitle: HRX Supreme Foam
settings.title: Pressure-Relieving & Contouring
settings.content: Our mattresses are developed with motion-absorbing design that ensures undisturbed sleep even when your pet

settings.layers_left_description: Take a look under the covers.
settings.layers_right_heading_1_description: This temperature-regulating breathable cover makes mattress maintenance easy: It’s moisture-wicking, easy to remove, and washable.
settings.layers_right_heading_2_description: This groundbreaking layer of memory foam enhances breathability by absorbing and dissipating body heat so you keep your cool all night long.
settings.layers_right_heading_3_title: 3. Ergonomic and Motion Isolating. HALO® Memory Foam.
settings.layers_right_heading_3_description: The 3 zones in our mattresses are designed to provide both spinal alignment and the pressure-relieving support for individual body zones, which include the shoulders, back, and hips. This layer also limits motion transfer so light sleepers can sleep easy when their partner (or pet!) tosses and turns in bed.
settings.layers_right_heading_4_description: HRX stands for High Resiliency Extra–this foam layer is engineered to last for years, holding firm and preventing sag. 5 adaptive cut-outs and over 100 supportive points distribute your body weight evenly to reduce pressure on your body. The result? Enhanced stability and support where you need it most!
settings.layers_right_heading_5_description: A reinforced perimeter that not only helps prevent restless and active sleepers from falling off at night, but also helps all sleepers easily sit up in the morning.

settings.title: How does the Emma Original feel?
settings.subtitle: MATTRESS FIRMNESS SCALE
settings.description: On a soft to firm scale, we’re just right which means that you’ll feel the cloudlike comfort of modern memory foam while still have just the right amount of support to protect your back and hips as you sleep soundly through the night.

settings.title: What makes Emma mattresses special?
settings.content: Emma smoothly combines high-quality materials to create a dream-like mattress that conforms to every body type. Through the combination of our extensive research and advanced foam technology, Emma offers the comfiest sleep possible. Emma mattresses offer comfort point-elastic caving that enables an ideal and unique fit for your body. As a result, your spine stays straight while at the same time offering you the necessary amount of support and comfort.

settings.title: How do I set up the mattress?
settings.content: Setting up has never been this easy. All you have to do is unpack, unwrap, and unroll.

settings.title: How can I wash my Emma products?
settings.content: Emma products come with a washable cover. Simply open the zip and separate the top from the bottom part. Wash the cover at 140°F in the washing machine. You can also wash single stains off by hand with a gentle washing detergent.

settings.title: Are Emma mattresses compatible with adjustable bases?

settings.title: Shipping, Warranty, & Returns
settings.content:
Free Shipping

We work with UPS & FedEx to ship your Emma products straight from our warehouse to your front door.

Free Returns

Our risk-free 365-night trial means that you get 365 nights to relax into your Emma mattress and experience the benefits of a good night’s sleep in order to make that decision. We encourage and require a trial period of 21 nights on your mattress so that you and your body can get suited to your Emma mattress.

10-Year Warranty

Enjoy a 10-Year Warranty for each Emma mattress purchase.

settings.title: Certifications
settings.content: Our top-of-the-line foams are all CertiPUR-US® certified, meaning, they are made without any ozone-depleting chemicals and safe from VOCs, formaldehyde, and phthalates.
